body.name: HOSHANHO 7 Inch Japanese Chef Knife, Ultra Sharp High Carbon Stainless Steel AUS-10 Kitchen Knife, Professional Santoku Knives with Ergonomic Pakkawood Handle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 28 mins
features: 【Ultra-tough Stainless Steel Blade】The whole blade forged with triple-layer laminated steel, made of high-end Japanese steel AUS-10, which can withstands cold, heat, and corrosion for long-term use. It's hardness reaches 62HRC, the steel contains about 0.9% carbon, making it two times as hard as other knives in its class.

【Unique & Fashion Design】Our kitchen knife comes with frosted design, unique polishing technology and hand sharpened 15° blade angle make thinner cuts, accomplishing a variety of difficult tasks in the kitchen with more precision. Double-side groove design can reduce cutting resistance and prevent food sticking.

【Ergonomic Pakkawood Handle】This HOSHANHO chef knife adopted with smooth and ergonomic handle, ensuring optimum comfort, control, and agility. The knife's handle is made from African pakkawood, which will not be cracked by thermal expansion and is durable.

【Versatile Chef's Knife】This Japanese Santoku knife is suitable for home and professional use, chopping, slicing, dicing, and is also suitable for cutting fruits, bread, vegetables, fillets or meats etc, easily do your daily kitchen tasks.

【Perfect Gifts】HOSHANHO sharp knife packaged with a luxurious gift box. It is suitable for both home and restaurant kitchen, is perfect gift for any cook or knife enthusiast as a wedding gift, housewarming gift, christmas present.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOSHANHO 7 Inch Japanese Kitchen Knife During the crafting process, artisans pay attention to every detail, striving for the perfect combination of quality and beauty in their knives. They skillfully use forging techniques to polish the blade to a smooth and lustrous finish.

Previous page Next page HOSHANHO santoku knives are made of high-quality steel as raw material, which is forged and quenched through multiple processes to ensure that the knives are sturdy, durable, and incredibly sharp.

Previous page Next page The santoku knife is a versatile kitchen knife for a variety of ingredients and scenarios. With its unique design and sharp blade, it can easily handle ingredients of different hardness, such as vegetables, fruits and meat.

■ About us HOSHANHO has a 30-year history of development. The founder has traveled to many eastern and western countries to learn from advanced knife technology. And he founded the HOSHANHO brand in 1992, popularized in Europe in 2000, and created the first serie of knife in North America in 2020 --- Japanese chef's knives, we named "Loong", adopting the meaning of oriental auspicious luck, bringing a different cooking experience to our chefs. ■ About Process A superior kitchen knife often requires advanced and more complex production processes; this kitchen knife has undergone more than 40 processes from cutting, straightening, heat treatment, grinding and polishing to its birth, every detail has been adjusted many times and strict control; we put a lot of effort into this knife to provide you with a satisfactory experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this purchase.
reviews.reviewText: This knife is very sharp and vey easy to handle and control. Yes, the spine and the cutting edge is curved. That’s what’s shown as the design in the pictures. I haven’t experienced any negative impact from that. I feel that the curved cutting edge makes it easier to work with. The weight of the knife makes it feel solid, well made and definitely not cheap. The handle feels perfectly designed in my hand. This knife cuts through fruit and vegetables like butter. It very easily peeled off a blemish on the skin of a tomato. I have used it to cut extremely thin uniform slices of onions. I also used it to slice up a thick crusty stuffed pizza, and it easily cut through it. I really love this knife, and I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, LOVE these knives!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic and very attractive product. The knives arrived quickly and undamaged. They were packed well. The quality is great for the price. Knives were sharp, they fit well on the base, the base was easy to attach to the wall, and the knives stay in place. The magnet holds them firmly. I did need to place this somewhere I would accidentally poke myself or knock the knives inadvertently. Really pleased with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nicely finished it is sharp out of the box. Comfortable handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great knife! Came out of the box sharp and ready to be used. The weight is evenly distributed throughly which makes for effortless cutting. The only gripe and it’s not much at all is the handles. It’s not like mostHandles and can take a little to get used to but that’s it. Overall it’s a great knife that is clearly made of high quality material!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with this knife, the sharpness is amazing- it just glides through the food. The comfort and the way it fits in my hand is great. I love the way the edge of the blade looks. It seems quite durable but I haven't had it long enough to judge that aspect (I will update my review if theres any issues) and I am not planning on putting it in the dishwasher.This is a really nice knife and the price is worth it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These knives are an absolute game changer. I actually enjoy cooking now. I have been using them for about a month now and they are still super sharp and work perfectly. My friends who have tried using these have decided to buy one for themselves as well. And I am thinking of buying a set as a gift for a friend. I have 2 chef knives from different brands (each in the 40-50 dollar range) and they are not nearly as good. So I would highly recommend getting this 6-piece set.

reviews.reviewerName: The Little Abortion That Got Away
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spice Goddess Gail
reviews.reviewText: That's her name. Yes, all of my knives have names.Really love the way the handle melts in your hand; not in your mouth. Good weight. Not sure how it started out, but she's ridiculously sharp now. In my uneducated opinion, it is a very high quality knife as far as stamped blades go.My Precious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a knife of this size in my kitchen, so I took the plunge on this one, not quite knowing what to expect. I'm glad I did. The knife has great hand feel, the weight and the size of the handle convey a sense of quality. The blade is wider than other high-quality knives I have, and I like that. The handle wood is attractive. The whole feel is one of quality. The blade is not at all flimsy, but quite substantial and it won't flex.One thing I haven't evaluated yet (because I haven't had it long) is how it will respond to sharpening. But I'm not worried. A knife must be sharpened properly. (Other reviewers remark how sharp the knife is when you receive it- which it is, sharp enough to shave with, I think- but do they realize that with use it will dull and have to be resharpened?)I was so impressed that I also bought the paring knife from this series.I also have some high quality (and expensive) European knives, much more expensive than this one. This knife easily hangs with them, if not outclassing them.For some reason, the price on these knives goes up and down frequently. I got mine at a low price. Well worth it.

Das Messer hat eine tolle und ausgewogene Haptik, alles ist 100% perfekt verarbeitet, von der Messerspitze bis zum Griffende.Die Materialien sind alle sehr hochwertig, die Klinge ist super schnitthaltig und sehr scharf.
Bin kein Profi !Aber meiner Meinung nach ein sehr gutes Messer.Verarbeitung ist top.Liegt sehr gut in der Hand.Schärfe ist gut ,mal sehen wie lange.

Das Messer sieht sehr gut aus und macht einen wertigen Eindruck. Vom schneidverhalten macht es eine gute Arbeit, zudem gleitet man durch die Lebensmittel und muss keine große Kraft aufwenden. Wer dieses Messer kauft macht nicht falsch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr schönes Messer mit hervorragender Verarbeitung
reviews.reviewText: Ein sehr schönes, auffälliges Messer, das gut in der Hand liegt. Die Verarbeitung ist hervorragend. Der Übergang vom Griff zur Klinge ist nicht spürbar, also perfekt gearbeitet.Zur Schärfe sage ich nichts, denn das hat jeder Messerbesitzer selbst in der Hand. Ein Duo-Schleifstein 400/1000 oder 1000/4000 ist ausreichend und ein wenig Übung mit einem Test-Messer.Für ein Santoku-Messer ist die Schnittkante eigentlich zu stark gebogen, aber das ist nun mal das Design, entweder man mag es oder man mag es nicht. Mir gefällt es gut.Also Leute, die mal was anderes möchten als das übliche Gyuto- oder Santoku-Einerlei, sind hier gut beraten --> Kaufempfehlung.Preislich es es kein besonderes Schnäppchen, aber durchaus akzeptabel.
Hält sehr gut dfie Schärfe. Ausgezeichnetes Messer
